wiki.content:
Michael truly surpassed himself in this 9 minute short film directed by John Singleton. The video contained celebrity friends of Michael's, such as Eddie Murphy, Iman, and Magic Johnson, and also featured highly complex dance routines. 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Michael truly surpassed himself in this 9 minute short film directed by John Singleton. The video contained celebrity friends of Michael's, such as Eddie Murphy, Iman, and Magic Johnson, and also featured highly complex dance routines.

track.name: Remember the Time
comments: I remember when I was in 5th Grade, My Dad played this song over and over again.
For me, this is his testament song. Yes, 18 years too early.
gerade habe ich  mich beschwert, dass ich noch kein MJ Lied höre ... da , you wonna hear me ? hahahaha
I fucking love this <3 Dangerous is epic
Do you, do you, do you! Those are some intense moments. Love that shit.

WTF  - thats not MIchael Jackson!!!

Incorrect version 05.11.2012
That  time ah...yes I remember that.
His voice is EPIC in this song! DO YOU DO YOU DO YOU <3
